data.name: LineBreakUserOptions
desc: Line break options passed in calls to XBreakIterator.getLineBreak().

items.name: allowPunctuationOutsideMargin
lines: If punctuation characters are allowed at the end of the line if outside of the margins, resulting in a line not being wrapped if only the punctuation would wrap.

items.name: applyForbiddenRules
lines: If the forbidden characters rules are to be applied or not.

items.name: forbiddenBeginCharacters
lines: Characters not allowed at the beginning of a line.

items.name: forbiddenEndCharacters
lines: Characters not allowed at the end of a line.
